full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO LA GLUD RDZONGS BYA TSUL ZHES PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(DPAL LDAN LHA MO LA BRTEN PA'I GLUD RDZONGS 'DI NI RANG RANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA PHAN PA'I PHYIR MA MO'I GLUD RDZONGS RGYAS PA RNAMS LAS CUNG ZAD BSDUS, BSDUS PA RNAMS LAS CUNG ZAD BSNAN TE, CHOS KYI RJE'I THA SHAL SKAL BZANG MING CAN BRIS BSGRIGS PA LA DPAL LDAN MKHAS PA RNAMS LA BZOD PAR GSOL YI GE PA NI YU SEM CING PI LIG THU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL LO,, LEGS SO,, ,,)
